UGREEN LP187 Laptop Sleeve Bag #20476

The UGREEN LP187 Laptop Sleeve Bag is compatible with 14 to 14.9-inch laptops. It offers complete 360° protection for your tablet, effectively shielding it from shocks and accidental drops. The interior is lined with soft microfiber synthetic leather, ensuring the screen and tablet body remain safe. UGREEN LP187 13" Laptop Sleeve Bag #60985

The UGREEN LP187 13" Laptop Bag provides complete protection and convenience for your 13- to 13.9-inch laptop. This sleeve, which is made of sturdy polyurethane PU leather, offers 360° of total protection, shielding your gadget from scuffs, spills, and mechanical harm. The body and screen of your laptop or tablet are protected by its shockproof and waterproof construction and soft microfibre synthetic leather interior. Because of its tiny size and side-opening zipper design, it can be easily transported by hand or in bigger luggage. It also prevents accidental drops. In addition to providing extra security during transit, the reinforced inside and soft fabric lining also enable worry-free use even in wet weather. With compatibility for a wide range of laptop models, including the MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, Surface Book, Dell Inspiron, HP Elitebook, Asus ZenBook, and Acer Swift series, the UGREEN LP187 13" Laptop Sleeve Bag is designed to accommodate a diverse user base. Moreover, the two kinds of zippers and lids that are sized to fit various laptops increase adaptability, and the mouse pad changing feature makes the design more useful. To accommodate the various demands of contemporary laptop users, the UGREEN LP187 13" Laptop Sleeve Bag blends style, protection, and functionality for both daily use and travel.
